author: joeyaiello
body:
This is a new cmdlet shipping with `6.0.0-beta.2`. The current parameter name is `-MaxRelLink`, but it should be spelled out as `-MaximumRelLink`.

There is other precedent for using `Maximum` instead of `Max`:

```powershell
gcm -ParameterName max* -syntax | sls 'max'
```

`rel` should stay "abbreviated" because the term is actually a "rel link" (per [this IETF spec](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5988#section-5)). 

/cc @SteveL-MSFT

comments.author: joeyaiello

title: Invoke-RestMethod -MaxRelLink should be -MaximumRelLink
